name: Starcraft / Starcraft: Remastered - Iron Wolves Standalone Missions
shortName: Starcraft / Starcraft: Remastered - Iron Wolves Standalone Missions
description:
The Iron Wolves Standalone missions are a series of scenarios featuring the mercenaries and their operations.



These missions are meant for those who have some experience playing Starcraft and enjoy having a few one-off scenario maps to play. Other maps are in the pipe as well, keep an eye out and enjoy the game!



In the current pack there are 4 maps. In order they are:

\- Cavalry Coming (Single Player, Macro Base Defense and Tug-of-war)

\- Power Grab (Single Player, Macro Objective Capture)

\- Burning Sands (Single Player, Macro Rescue Operation)

\- Deserted (Single Player, Macro Dual-Race Objective Capture)





Please, let me know if there are issues on any of the maps. Refinement is a process that a single person cannot do alone.
author: dzplayer
